look at the tutorials on teamxcuter.com
and also utube look for flashing a xbox360 slim with Lt3.0.
note the xbox elites and arcades are easy to do imo ive never flashed a slim but i do know how it done its not hard if you have the hardware,u will need to know what drive you have inside your slim etc good luck.

Thanks boobsman!
I'm using SmartTrack DVD9 to burn. They are 2 times cheaper than verbatim - $1,5 here (verbatim is $3). Their code is CMC MAG-D03-64. For them to work i use liteone dvd writer flashed to support XGD3 writes and also changed write speed in firmware from minimum 4x to 2,4x. On 2,4x all burns are 100% ok.
will this work on lt 3.0 when burned with img burn  ?
